args: Create a retired teacher in their 60s who loves gardening and lives in Vermont. Include hobbies, personality traits, and lifestyle details.

lifestyle_details.daily_routine: Starts the day with a cup of herbal tea and tends to her garden, enjoys afternoon walks in the countryside, and attends local book club meetings in the evenings.
lifestyle_details.home: Lives in a cozy cottage with a well-maintained garden filled with various flowers and vegetables.
